I was being recommended to here through my friend. It's pretty challenging in Singapore to find a vox teacher who is patient and quick to solve our issues. I came with curiousity and guess what, Cai Laoshi was professional, sincere and understanding enough to answer all my questions!

Never painful to give it a try! Who knows this 'try' is actually a forward stepping stone in your singing passion? :-)
